title: Scotland v Denmark: World Cup 2026 qualifying – live
summary: Scotland and Denmark face off at Hampden Park in a crucial match, with the winner securing automatic qualification for the World Cup. The game is being covered in a minute-by-minute report by Rob Smyth. Fans eagerly anticipate the outcome in this high-stakes showdown.

title: Man charged with murder of Oakland football coach ordered to stay in jail without bail
summary: Cedric Irving Jr. has been charged in connection with the shooting death of John Beam, a respected figure at Laney College. Beam was fatally shot on campus last week, prompting local outrage and mourning. The case is ongoing as authorities investigate the circumstances surrounding the incident.

title: House votes 427-1 to release Epstein files; Senate majority leader says chamber will take up vote ‘fairly quickly’ – US politics live
summary: A bill mandating the release of all documents related to the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein passed with near-unanimous support. Lawmakers aim to promote transparency and accountability surrounding the case. The move comes amid ongoing public scrutiny of Epstein's dealings and associated individuals.

title: Wilson treble helps Wales thrash North Macedonia to boost World Cup dream
summary: Harry Wilson netted a hat-trick as Wales dominated North Macedonia with a 7-1 victory. This win secures Wales home advantage for their upcoming World Cup playoff semi-final. The impressive performance highlights Wilson's key role in the team's success.
